DataElement.preferredDefinition: One of the bodies (normally 46 in humans) in the cell nucleus that is the bearer of genes, has the form of a delicate chromatin filament during interphase, contracts to form a compact cylinder segmented into two arms by the centromere during metaphase and anaphase stages of cell division, and is capable of reproducing its physical and chemical structure through successive cell divisions. In microbes, the chromosome is prokaryotic, not being enclosed within a nuclear membrane and not being subject to a mitotic mechanism._The words or language units by which a thing is known._Value Domain for java language String datatype.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: One of the bodies (normally 46 in humans) in the cell nucleus that is the bearer of genes, has the form of a delicate chromatin filament during interphase, contracts to form a compact cylinder segmented into two arms by the centromere during metaphase and anaphase stages of cell division, and is capable of reproducing its physical and chemical structure through successive cell divisions. In microbes, the chromosome is prokaryotic, not being enclosed within a nuclear membrane and not being subject to a mitotic mechanism._The words or language units by which a thing is known.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: One of the bodies (normally 46 in humans) in the cell nucleus that is the bearer of genes, has the form of a delicate chromatin filament during interphase, contracts to form a compact cylinder segmented into two arms by the centromere during metaphase and anaphase stages of cell division, and is capable of reproducing its physical and chemical structure through successive cell divisions. In microbes, the chromosome is prokaryotic, not being enclosed within a nuclear membrane and not being subject to a mitotic mechanism.

Concepts.definition: A structure found in cells that is comprised of a strand of linearized double-stranded DNA plus proteins that package the DNA in a condensed coil form and regulate chromosomal function.

Property.preferredDefinition: The words or language units by which a thing is known.

Concepts.definition: The words or language units by which a thing is known.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Comment
ReferenceDocuments.description: The numeric or letter designation of a chromosome.  Autosomes are usually indicated by numbers and sex chromosomes by letters.
